name: commafeed
description: CommaFeed is a self-hosted RSS feed reader and Google Reader replacement. It provides categories, filtering, sharing, and a sleek UI with mobile support. Designed for users who want to keep control of their news feeds.

features.title: Google Reader Replacement
features.description: Familiar interface for former Google Reader users. Smooth transition guaranteed

features.title: Category Organization
features.description: Group feeds into custom categories for easy navigation. Stay organized effortlessly

features.title: Advanced Filtering
features.description: Create rules to highlight or hide specific content. See only what matters

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design works perfectly on phones and tablets. Read anywhere, anytime

features.title: Sharing Features
features.description: Share interesting articles with friends and colleagues. Built-in social features

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Own your news feed data and reading history. Complete privacy control
